title: My naval experiences : World War II
creator_credit: Tom Clark and ACMI Digital Storytelling
brief_description: Tom Clark recalls the declaration of war against Germany by Prime Minister Menzies. He then shares his experiences of enlisting in the Navy in 1942 as a mid shipman, his time on the HMAS Kanimbla and fighting the Japanese in the Pacific
description: Tom Clark recalls the declaration of war against Germany by Prime Minister Menzies. He then shares his experiences of enlisting in the Navy in 1942 as a mid shipman, his time on the HMAS Kanimbla and fighting the Japanese in the Pacific
